properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 v3 v4

authors.author: Fanny J. Crosby William H. Doane

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Savior, Savior, hear my humble cry.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
While on others Thou art calling,
Do not pass me by.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Pass me not, O gentle Savior;
Hear my humble cry.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Let me at Thy throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Kneeling there in deep contrition,
Help my unbelief.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Trusting only in Thy merit,
Would I seek Thy face.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Heal my wounded, broken spirit.
Save me by Thy grace.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Thou, the Spring of all my comfort,
More than life to me,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Whom have I on earth beside Thee?
Whom in heaven but Thee?
